section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The list window that contains the terminology list to be deleted is active.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The terminology list to be deleted
Delete from the File menu

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p:
Before the system deletes the selected list, it asks you to confirm whether you really want it:
If you select No, you can leave the delete function.
If you select Yes, the list is deleted.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you selected Yes, the list is deleted; otherwise it remains unchanged.
